workHistory.jobResponsibilities:
Developing user interfaces using React.js,Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code, Building and managing reusable components with React.js, Optimizing components for performance and ensuring smooth rendering, Implementing global state management with React Context API and Redux,
Integrating RESTful APIs and handling asynchronous data fetching,
Managing real-time data using WebSockets or similar technologies,
Creating data visualizations and interactive graphs using D3.js,
Debugging and maintaining code quality, refactoring when necessary,
Collaborating with back-end developers, designers, and other team members,
Using Git and participating in Agile development processes.
Staying updated on the latest trends and best practices in React.js and front-end development.
